description: Schema for reporting a flag that indicates something about an associated quality metric

___quality_metrics.description: One or more specific quality metrics that this flag applies to.
___quality_metrics.title: Quality Metrics

items.description: A particular QC metric associated with this flag.
items.title: QC Metric

___flag.internal_comment: Can be associated with a specific quality metric that generates the flag
___flag.description: A flag that may indicate an issue with an experiment
___flag.title: Flag
